properties.areaDesc: Cleburne, AR; Conway, AR; Lonoke, AR; Independence, AR; White, AR; Perry, AR; Faulkner, AR; Pulaski, AR; Van Buren, AR
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 10 at 11:05PM CST until January 11 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southwestern Independence County in north central Arkansas...
Northeastern Perry County in central Arkansas...
Southeastern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas...
Northwestern Lonoke County in central Arkansas...
Cleburne County in north central Arkansas...
Faulkner County in central Arkansas...
Eastern Conway County in central Arkansas...
Western White County in central Arkansas...
Northern Pulaski County in central Arkansas...

* Until midnight CST.

* At 1105 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Sugar Loaf Recreation Area to near Greenbrier
to Toad Suck to Wye Mountain, moving east at 30 mph.

HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to
mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings.

* Locations impacted include...
Conway...                         Sherwood...
Jacksonville...                   Cabot...
Heber Springs...                  Clinton...
Little Rock AFB...                Greenbrier...
Vilonia...                        Mayflower...
Greers Ferry...                   Wooster...
Quitman...                        Guy...
Pangburn...                       Rose Bud...
Damascus...                       Enola...
Twin Groves...                    Menifee...

This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 114 and 142.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for central and
north central Arkansas.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread
significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately
likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of
a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant
property damage.
